attributes.action: In memory of Robin Williams.. call for more understanding and support in Mental Health
attributes.additional_details:
In hours after actor Robin Williams died due to sucide it opened many peoples eyes to how serious depression really is and sadly took a very much loved mans life to make people see. Sadly due to resources lack of funds and understanding people are not Educated enough to understand  the effects of depression can have on a persons life.
When people go for an assesment they are sometimes left for weeks before there first initial counselling session these are six block sessions some may be offered more . I feel more in the waiting time and after care should be done to ensure a positive recovery. DEPRESSION is a nasty illness and changes they way.you think the way you deal with things medication helps but also Id like to call for more other kinds of therepy tailored to each persons needs
Please help me by signing this and sharing
